inventorysorter.config.support.descripti:
Thank you for using this mod üß°  
Maintaining it takes time, coffee, and a bit of magic dust.

If you'd like to support future updates ‚Äî or just want your name in lights ‚Äî consider becoming a sponsor.
Also helps me justify to my lizard doggo plushie why I'm still at the keyboard at 2am.
